org.letras.ps.region.penconnector
Class PenAccessManager

java.lang.Object
  org.letras.ps.region.penconnector.PenAccessManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPenAccessConfiguration
public class PenAccessManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPenAccessConfiguration

The PenAccessManager is the top-level class of the PenConnectorService-Module. The Setup should be done in three steps

  1. Create a new PenAccessManager using the constructor
  2. Set the factory for SampleProcessors with setSampleProcessorFactory
  3. Start the discovery service with a call to init

Author:
niklas

Method Detail

init

public void init()
Starts the discovery service for remote pens. Make sure Mundo.init() has been called beforehand.

allowPenInGeneral

public void allowPenInGeneral(java.lang.String penId,
                              boolean propagate)
Description copied from interface: IPenAccessConfiguration
Adds a pen to the list of allowed pens in the general rule. This does not have any effect if the pen is already allowed.

Specified by:
allowPenInGeneral in interface IPenAccessConfiguration
Parameters:
penId - the pen that should be allowed or IPenAccessConfiguration.WILDCARD if all pens should be allowed.
propagate - set to true if the change should propagate in all zones

Specified by:
allowPenInZone in interface IPenAccessConfiguration
Parameters:
penId - the pen that should be allowed or IPenAccessConfiguration.WILDCARD to allow all pens
zone - the zone for which the pen should be allowed
